data.description:
Aquascape is a relaxing and creative VR game where you can create your own unique aquascape using a variety of fish, plants, and decorations. You can also customize your aquarium by adding rocks, driftwood, and other features.
The game features realistic graphics and immersive gameplay, which will make you feel like you become an aquascape expert. You can even use the pass-through MR mode to experience aquascaping in a real space.
Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned aquascaper, Aquascape has something to offer every player. With its variety of requests and rewards, there's always something new to learn and explore.

Here are some of the key features of Aquascape:

CREATE YOUR OWN AQUASCAPE
Select and arrange a variety of fish, plants, and decorations to create your own unique aquascape.

REALISTIC GRAPHIC
Immerse yourself in a beautiful and realistic underwater world.

DISPLAY YOUR CREATION
Display your aquascapes in the Gallery for others to see, or sell them to earn rewards.

PASSTHROUGH MR MODE
Experience aquascaping in a real space by placing virtual objects in your real-world environment.


If you're looking for a relaxing and creative game that you can enjoy for hours on end, then Aquascape is the perfect game for you. Start playing today and create your own aquascape masterpiece!

*This is an Early Access version, so user data may be reset when it's released officially. Your valuable feedback is very helpful in developing a better Aquascape.
